Intro

Self-motivated logistical Product Designer and fluid Front-End Developer continually increasing product value and usability with a graphically pleasing, intuitive interface.

Skills

Product Design

Effectivley delivering products through the use of a proven process called Lean UX, a combination of Lean Startup and User Experience.

Front-End Development

Progressively designing for all platforms to enhance all user's experiences. Assertively developing clean code being attentive to future development at time of initial implementation.

Career

The Face of Tyler Goelz, Inc.

Product Designer & Front-End Developer, Contractor

20011-Present

Songbird Agency

Songbird Agency is a great online creative outlet for me to work with clients to create the best products for great companies. I work directly with the client to make sure that the online and/or physical product they are delivering is the very best it can be. I've played Lead Product Designer on projects such as Get Fit For Birth.

Skills: Design Theory & Process (Wireframes, Prototypes, Style Guides), WordPress MU, CSS3, Photoshop CC, git

ActivPrayer

ActivPrayer provides people everywhere with an easy way to share their own inspired actions and join others to support the personal and community intentions that matter most to them. I championed the process of taking ActivPrayer from wireframes to a fully functional social media platform, allowing for people to connect one another and create, like, share & join 'activprayers.'

Skills: Design Theory & Process (Wireframes, Prototypes, Style Guides), Django Front-End Integration, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, git

Quantum Capital Partners

Quantum Capital Partners provides capital for privately owned, rapidly-growing businesses primarily in the Southeastern United States. I played Lead Front-End Developer implementing a simple smart site including a file uploading and archiving system.

Skills: MVC3, .Net 4.0, Visual Studio 2010, jQuery, AJAX, HTML5 Boilerplate, CSS3

Co-Founder & Lead Product Designer

2012-Present

SproutCamp is a top tier mentor-driven accelerator program that provides entrepreneurs with a top quality program born from the principles of lean startup, customer development and user-centered design.
